attributes.action: recognise the valuable contribution of the work of those who were involved in requests for details about MPs' expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it had not been for the determined efforts of the people who requested information on MPs' expenses, this important matter never would have come into the public domain. Those who made the requests should be acknowledged and thanked by the Prime Minister, or other suitable personage, for their valuable contribution in making our political representatives accountable to the people they serve.

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions (http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms), we cannot accept petitions which call on the PM to "recognise" or "acknowledge".
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
